title: Londoners without Underground service during walkout
description: Members of the RMT union are staging a walkout until Thursday over terms and conditions.
content:
Londoners turn to bikes and buses in Tube strike
Severely disrupted London Underground services spurred Londoners to turn to bikes, buses and black cabs to make their way through the capital during the first working day of a Tube workers' strike.

title: Sinner’s reaction to US Open defeat shows why he and Alcaraz will tower over the tour for years to come
description: Italian has dominated against all opponents except one but rivalry with Spaniard has prompted him to plan big changes
content: In the 90 minutes between Jannik Sinner’s defeat by Carlos Alcaraz in the US Open final and his post-match debrief, his mind had already shifted. Rather than dwelling on the pain of losing his US Open title and No 1 ranking, he was thinking about the... [4523 chars]

title: Some people ill, police say, after 'possible hazardous materials incident' at Heathrow
description: Terminal 4 has now reopened, the airport says, after it earlier told passengers not to travel there.
content:
Fire brigade 'standing down' response
The London Fire Brigade (LFB) is "standing down" its response to what was earlier described as a "possible hazardous materials incident at Heathrow Airport."

title: François Bayrou ousted as French PM after losing confidence vote
description: Government collapses after Emmanuel Macron’s ally wins support of just 194 MPs with 364 against
content:
François Bayrou has been ousted in a confidence vote after only nine months as prime minister, collapsing his minority government and plunging France into a political crisis.
Bayrou, 74, will hand his resignation to Emmanuel Macron, his longterm cent... [5157 chars]

title: Terminal at Heathrow Airport evacuated after 'possible hazardous materials incident'
description: A terminal at Heathrow Airport has been evacuated while emergency services respond to a "possible hazardous materials incident".
content:
A terminal at Heathrow Airport has been evacuated while emergency services respond to a "possible hazardous materials incident".
